g.text: Real-time insights from all stages: PRD metrics, architecture decisions, code quality, test results, deployment status, performance monitoring
• AI-human collaboration • Real-time oversight • Continuous AI tool optimization • Human strategic guidance
• AI performance monitoring • Tool integration management • Quality gate automation • Feedback loop optimization
• Hybrid decision making • AI output validation • Human creativity & AI efficiency • Continuous learning cycles
• Zero wait time: No approval bottlenecks
• Complex failure modes difficult to predict
